text: Ashim Kumar Majhi, is an Indian politician, born in Jirat, was elected as MLA of Balagarh Vidhan Sabha Constituency in West Bengal Legislative Assembly in 2011 and 2016,List of Winners in West Bengal 2011List of Winners in West Bengal 2016 as an All India Trinamool Congress candidate. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:All India Trinamool Congress politicians Category:Bengali politicians Category:Members of the West Bengal Legislative Assembly
title: Ashim Kumar Majhi
